name: TRUCKIN FRESH (AN ORANGE CREAM CUSTARD)
description:
https://youtu.be/VtbPa8LnGSg

The LB Ice Cream and FLV Vanilla Pudding form a shake and vape custard base CREDIT TO FRESH03 FOR THIS DISCOVERY

INW SHISHA ORANGE. Imagine a cross between orange sherbet and an orange candy for the profile
Initially it has the peel or white part of the orange but the pretty mush fades after a week steep and your left with a delicious orange cream flavor. This flavor separates like some of the other oranges so be sure to shake well andd any juice itâ€™s in as well. 

The JF Honey peach and the Armenia are to help fill out the orange as well as provide some brightness and juiciness to the recipe well

HOPE YOU ENJOY!!
author: VapinTrucker

reviews.text: This was really tasty.  A creamy cross between orange and peach custard.  I got a wee bit of bitterness from something in it that I think would vanish with a touch of sweetener.  On the other hand I could see it being like having a tiny bit of orange zest grated into the custard mix if you are into that.
